class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        diffs = [a-b for a,b in zip(nums,target)]
        
        out = 0
        offset = 0
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            value = diffs[i]
            if diffs[i] >= 0:
                offset = max(0, offset)
                offset = min(offset, value)
            else:
                offset = min(0, offset)
                offset = max(offset, value)
            
            diff = abs(offset - diffs[i])
            out += diff
            offset = diffs[i]
        return out
